rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Oseltamivir (generic Tamiflu) is an antiviral medication that disrupts the replication of the Influenza A and B viruses, including the avian “bird flu” H5N1 variant to reduce the severity of flu symptoms.
